description: Creates an Lambda layer from a ZIP archive. Each time you call PublishLayerVersion with the same layer name, a new version is created. Add layers to your function with  CreateFunction or  UpdateFunctionConfiguration.

parameters.name: LayerName
parameters.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the layer.

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The function layer archive. S3Bucket (string) --- The Amazon S3 bucket of the layer archive. S3Key (string) --- The Amazon S3 key of the layer archive. S3ObjectVersion (string) --- For versioned objects, the version of the layer archive object to use. ZipFile (bytes) --- The base64-encoded contents of the layer archive. Amazon Web Services SDK and Amazon Web Services CLI clients handle the encoding for you.

nested_params.name: S3Bucket
nested_params.description: The Amazon S3 bucket of the layer archive.

nested_params.name: S3Key
nested_params.description: The Amazon S3 key of the layer archive.

nested_params.name: S3ObjectVersion
nested_params.description: For versioned objects, the version of the layer archive object to use.

nested_params.name: ZipFile
nested_params.description: The base64-encoded contents of the layer archive. Amazon Web Services SDK and Amazon Web Services CLI clients handle the encoding for you.

parameters.name: CompatibleRuntimes
parameters.description: A list of compatible function runtimes. Used for filtering with  ListLayers and  ListLayerVersions. The following list includes deprecated runtimes. For more information, see Runtime deprecation policy. (string) ---

parameters.name: LicenseInfo
parameters.description: The layer's software license. It can be any of the following: An SPDX license identifier. For example, MIT. The URL of a license hosted on the internet. For example, https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT. The full text of the license.

parameters.name: CompatibleArchitectures
parameters.description: A list of compatible instruction set architectures. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: A link to the layer archive in Amazon S3 that is valid for 10 minutes.

nested_items.name: CodeSha256
nested_items.description: The SHA-256 hash of the layer archive.

nested_items.name: CodeSize
nested_items.description: The size of the layer archive in bytes.

nested_items.name: SigningProfileVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a signing profile version.

nested_items.name: SigningJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a signing job.

nested_items.name: LayerVersionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the layer version.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date that the layer version was created, in ISO-8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD).

nested_items.name: CompatibleArchitectures
nested_items.description: A list of compatible instruction set architectures.
